casebody.data:
Alton D. BROWN, Appellant
v.
PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee No. 17 MAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Decided: May 31, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 31 st day of May, 2019, Appellant's "Application For Leave To Proceed In Forma Pauperis " and "Application for Special Relief" are DENIED and the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
